amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Drug Enforcement Administration.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the DEA by $9,200,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kirk amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Kirk.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kirk amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
